title: Toy Soldier Orianna
body:
Why isn't this a skin already? I mean it makes perfect sense. She is clockwork like those wind up soldiers that march. Also you got toy soldier Gangplank to go with her :D


P.S I can't draw so I'm just gonna link some stuff so you get an idea of what I mean.

http://i.ebayimg.com/00/s/NjAwWDYwMA==/z/qMMAAOxyffZSaPMU/$T2eC16VHJHgFFl+7859HBS,PMTqM+!~~60_12.JPG?set_id=880000500F

http://i.ebayimg.com/00/s/NjAwWDYwMA==/z/lVAAAOxy~XxSaPMR/$(KGrHqR,!lIFJoESYyEZBS,PMQ07Gw~~60_12.JPG?set_id=880000500F

http://i.istockimg.com/file_thumbview_approve/2399922/2/stock-illustration-2399922-toy-soldiers.jpg

Yes these are male but with a little creativity you can swap it for female and somehow incorporate the ball.
